Crime_Name: Risk of Persecution or Harm upon Removal
Legal_Issue: Whether the Minister's Delegate's re-assessment complies with Section 97 of IRPA regarding personalized risk to the applicant upon return to Sri Lanka
Application_Facts: The Minister's Delegate concluded the applicant faced no more than generalized risk, dismissing specific Tamil risks as 'generalized.' Evidence suggests Tamils face unique dangers, contradicting this conclusion.
Decision_Outcome: Serious questions exist about the re-assessment; removal would render judicial review ineffective, constituting irreparable harm.
Court_Ruling: Stay of removal granted until judicial review concludes
Defendant_Behavior: Re-assessment by Minister's Delegate dismissing individualized risk for Tamils in Sri Lanka
Grounds_for_Claim: Misinterpretation of evidence regarding risks faced by Tamils in Sri Lanka
Procedural_Issue: Judicial review application following remittance for re-assessment
Evidence_Used: Evidence indicating unique dangers faced by Tamils in Sri Lanka
Application_Basis: Risk upon removal to Sri Lanka
Evidence_Assessed: Risks faced by Tamils in Sri Lanka
Relief_Sought: Stay of removal pending judicial review
Governing_Rule: Section 97 of IRPA requires individualized risk distinct from generalized country conditions
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Failure to recognize specific risks to Tamils as non-generalized
Harm_Assessment: Irreparable harm if removed before resolution of judicial review
Cause_Description: Applicant challenged the Minister's Delegate's decision claiming misinterpretation of evidence on Tamil-specific risks in Sri Lanka
Evidence_Handling: Minister's Delegate dismissed Tamil-specific risks as generalized despite contradictory evidence
Evidence_Issues: Dispute over whether risks to Tamils are individualized or generalized
Evidence_Assessment: Evaluation of whether applicant faces personal risk beyond general conditions in Sri Lanka
Decision_Rationale: Serious legal questions exist; stay necessary to preserve effective judicial review
Decision_Making_Body: Minister's Delegate, subject to court review
Evidentiary_Issues: Downplaying of ethnic-group-specific risks as generalized
